resources.title: Complete FODMAP Diet Guide
resources.description: A comprehensive introduction to the low FODMAP diet with step-by-step instructions.
resources.longDescription: This complete guide walks you through every aspect of the FODMAP diet, from understanding what FODMAPs are to implementing each phase successfully. Includes scientific explanations, practical tips, and answers to the most common questions about managing IBS symptoms through diet.
resources.author: Dr. Sarah Thompson, Registered Dietitian

resources.title: Elimination Phase Starter Kit
resources.description: Everything you need to successfully complete the 2-6 week elimination phase.
resources.longDescription: This comprehensive starter kit makes the challenging elimination phase manageable with day-by-day guidance, troubleshooting tips, and strategies to maintain nutritional balance while eliminating high-FODMAP foods. Includes symptom tracking tools and motivation techniques to help you stay consistent.
resources.author: Emma Richards, Clinical Nutritionist

resources.title: FODMAP Reintroduction Protocol
resources.description: Learn how to systematically reintroduce FODMAPs and identify your triggers.
resources.longDescription: This interactive guide provides a structured approach to testing each FODMAP group safely and effectively. Includes detailed testing schedules, symptom assessment tools, and guidance on interpreting your results. The interactive elements allow you to document your responses and generate a personalized tolerance profile.
resources.author: Dr. Michael Chen, Gastroenterologist

resources.title: 4-Week FODMAP Meal Plan
resources.description: Complete meal plans with shopping lists and prep instructions for a full month.
resources.longDescription: Never worry about what to eat during the elimination phase again! This comprehensive meal plan includes 28 days of breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snack options that are all low in FODMAPs while being high in nutrition and flavor. Each week includes a detailed shopping list, prep-ahead instructions, and time-saving tips.
resources.author: Chef Alex Morgan & Lisa Patel, RD

resources.title: Low FODMAP Shopping Guide
resources.description: Tips for grocery shopping and brand recommendations for FODMAP-friendly products.
resources.longDescription: Make grocery shopping stress-free with this detailed guide to navigating supermarket aisles on a low FODMAP diet. Includes aisle-by-aisle recommendations, lists of FODMAP-friendly brands for common products, label-reading tips, and smartphone app recommendations to help you shop confidently.
resources.author: Jamie Wilson, FODMAP Coach

resources.title: Reintroduction Tracking Journal
resources.description: Track your food intake and symptoms during the reintroduction phase with this printable journal.
resources.longDescription: This specially designed journal makes the reintroduction phase organized and insightful. Each spread includes space to document foods tested, portion sizes, symptom responses, and patterns observed. The journal includes guidance on how to rate symptoms and interpret your results.
resources.author: Dr. Rachel Kim, Digestive Health Specialist

resources.title: Meal Prep Techniques for FODMAP Diet
resources.description: Learn how to batch cook and prepare FODMAP-friendly meals to save time and reduce stress.
resources.longDescription: This video guide demonstrates practical meal prepping techniques specifically designed for the low FODMAP diet. Watch as Chef Maria demonstrates how to efficiently prepare a week's worth of FODMAP-friendly meals in just two hours, including storage tips to maintain freshness and flavor.
resources.author: Chef Maria Rodriguez

resources.title: FODMAP Elimination Phase Food List
resources.description: Comprehensive list of safe foods during the elimination phase.
resources.longDescription: This detailed food list covers over 300 common foods, categorized by food group and clearly marked as safe, moderate (with portion guidance), or high in FODMAPs. Includes a special section on confusing foods and hidden FODMAPs to help you avoid common pitfalls during the elimination phase.
resources.author: Monash University FODMAP Research Team

resources.title: FODMAP Reintroduction Challenge Schedule
resources.description: A structured 6-week plan for systematically testing your tolerance to each FODMAP group.
resources.longDescription: This detailed schedule provides a day-by-day plan for testing each FODMAP subgroup, including which foods to use, portion sizes to start with, and how to gradually increase exposure. The schedule includes buffer days between challenges to ensure clear results and recovery time.
resources.author: Dr. Julia Martinez, Functional Medicine Specialist

resources.title: 50 Low FODMAP Recipes for Beginners
resources.description: Simple, delicious recipes that anyone can make while following the low FODMAP diet.
resources.longDescription: This recipe collection focuses on simplicity and flavor, with each recipe requiring 10 ingredients or less and 30 minutes or less to prepare. All recipes are nutritionally balanced and include full macro and micronutrient information. Perfect for busy people who want to eat well while managing IBS symptoms.
resources.author: Chef Thomas Williams

resources.title: FODMAP Restaurant Survival Guide
resources.description: Tips and strategies for eating out while following the low FODMAP diet.
resources.longDescription: Don't let your dietary needs stop you from enjoying social events! This guide provides strategies for navigating restaurant menus, communicating with servers, and making smart choices at different types of restaurants. Includes specific menu recommendations for 15 common restaurant cuisines.
resources.author: Sophie Grant, Dietitian & Food Writer

resources.title: Understanding FODMAP Test Results
resources.description: Learn how to interpret your reintroduction test results and create a personalized diet plan.
resources.longDescription: This guide helps you make sense of your reintroduction phase findings and translate them into a practical, personalized diet plan. Includes guidance on identifying threshold levels, managing multiple sensitivities, and creating a long-term FODMAP-modified eating plan that maximizes food variety while minimizing symptoms.
resources.author: Dr. Peter Johnson, Gastroenterologist

resources.title: FODMAP Friendly Snack Guide
resources.description: 80+ ideas for quick, portable, and satisfying low FODMAP snacks.
resources.longDescription: Never be caught hungry without safe options again! This guide provides both store-bought and homemade snack ideas for every situationâ€”from desk drawers to travel to post-workout recovery. Each snack is nutritionally analyzed and includes serving size guidance to ensure FODMAP compliance.
resources.author: Natalie Wong, Sports Nutritionist

resources.title: FODMAP Diet for Special Diets
resources.description: Guidance for following the FODMAP diet while managing other dietary restrictions.
resources.longDescription: This specialized guide addresses the challenges of following the low FODMAP diet alongside other dietary needs, with dedicated sections for vegetarian/vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, and other common dietary restrictions. Includes specialized food lists, substitution ideas, and nutritional considerations for each combined approach.
resources.author: Dr. Anita Desai, Specialist in Nutritional Medicine

resources.title: Managing FODMAP Diet While Traveling
resources.description: Strategies for maintaining your diet while away from home, including international travel tips.
resources.longDescription: Don't let travel derail your digestive health! This guide provides practical strategies for maintaining FODMAP awareness while traveling domestically or internationally. Includes packing lists, translation cards for 12 languages, airplane meal tips, and country-specific food guides for 20 popular destinations.
resources.author: Marco Rossi, Travel Writer & IBS Advocate
